articles.title: Singapore approves Pfizer's Paxlovid pill for Covid-19 treatment - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A new oral antiviral drug for treating Covid-19 has been approved for use in Singapore, said the Health Sciences Authority on Thursday (Feb 3).
